metadata.description: AI systems plugins for agent runtime and tooling

plugins.name: agent-service
plugins.description: Skills and patterns for creating apps that use the agent runtime

plugins.name: smart-docs
plugins.description: Documentation standards and workflows for AI-native codebases. Provides structure, content guidelines, and templates for writing maintainable documentation.

plugins.name: project-tracker
plugins.description: Project tracking system for multi-session work. Manages initiatives, session summaries, ideas, and todos. Enables knowledge transfer across AI sessions.
